tweet.text: From diplomat to labor union, in poetry and prose, senders expressed grief and solidarity. In this #FavoriteFRUS, J. Volio wrote that President Jesús Jiménez Zamora of Costa Rica ordered the national flags on public buildings lowered to half-mast: https://t.co/pWr3IoYTff (2/2) https://t.co/iA714MljH8
